body:
Hi Mostapha, thanks for the file!

In regards to your question, I´m interested on generating OS files from honeybee in order to setup a workflow where advanced mechanical systems could be incorporated (in OS or directly over the IDF), and where all the geometry could be directly handled in Rhino-Grass. Some weeks ago, I tried to create an emodel of considerable size using OS in Sketchup and after a little bit the geometry handling became pretty messy and unstable. The implementation of the workflow is geared towards research as well as energy auditing of existing buildings.

Best!,

Alejandro
